{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which statement is false in relation to myofacial pain dysfunction syndrome, we need to review the information provided in the relevant documents. Document [20] discusses masticatory myofascial pain syndrome, which can present similarly to other dental conditions in odontogenetic structures.
